DataElement.preferredName: IWG-MRT Myelofibrosis Anemia Response Accomplishment Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not an IWG-MRT myelofibrosis anemia response was accomplished.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Transfusion-independent patients: a greater than or equal to 20 g/L increase in hemoglobin level or for transfusion-dependent patients: becoming transfusion-independent (adapted from Revised Response Criteria for Myelofibrosis: International Working Group-Myeloproliferative Neoplasms Research and Treatment (IWG-MRT) and European LeukemiaNet (ELN) consensus report. BLOOD 22 AUGUST 2013 x VOLUME 122 NUMBER 8)_Something that has been achieved or completed successfully.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Transfusion-independent patients: a greater than or equal to 20 g/L increase in hemoglobin level or for transfusion-dependent patients: becoming transfusion-independent (adapted from Revised Response Criteria for Myelofibrosis: International Working Group-Myeloproliferative Neoplasms Research and Treatment (IWG-MRT) and European LeukemiaNet (ELN) consensus report. BLOOD 22 AUGUST 2013 x VOLUME 122 NUMBER 8)

Concepts.definition: Transfusion-independent patients: a greater than or equal to 20 g/L increase in hemoglobin level or for transfusion-dependent patients: becoming transfusion-independent (adapted from Revised Response Criteria for Myelofibrosis: International Working Group-Myeloproliferative Neoplasms Research and Treatment (IWG-MRT) and European LeukemiaNet (ELN) consensus report. BLOOD 22 AUGUST 2013 x VOLUME 122 NUMBER 8)

Property.preferredDefinition: Something that has been achieved or completed successfully.

Concepts.definition: Something that has been achieved or completed successfully.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
